### SafeInForbiddenSlot() {#a1dcd37ae69b31428f0cc1cffb0b63a40}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MipsInstrInfo::SafeInForbiddenSlot (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a> to determine if an instruction can go in a forbidden slot.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a> for distingushing between control transfer instructions and all other instructions for handling forbidden slots.

Consider inline assembly as unsafe as well.
